name: WP NextGenManager
author: Lars-Erik Holtane Bergland

sections.description:
Features:

  • Create Galleries.

  • Update Gallery info (name, title and description).

  • Upload Images/Pictures from your phone.

  • Update Image info (alttext and description).

More features are coming, but I’d like to get some input on usage first. You can leave feedback on http://holtane.no/en/wp-nextgenmanager-2/ or mail me at lars-erik@holtane.no. I will try to answer questions fairly quickly.
sections.installation:
1. Upload wp-nexgenmanager to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory. Do not change the folder name, or the NggManager on your phone wil not detect the plugin.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Download NggManager to your android phone and add the site (full url: http://example.com/)
sections.changelog:
0.6

  • First beta.
  • Gallery creation and updating are working.
  • Uploading pictures and updating info are working.

0.6.1

Bugfix

short_description: This plugin is required by NggManager to enable updating of NextGen Gallery from an Android phone.
